name: The Escape of Ultraball
description:
Hey there! Welcome to The Escape of Ultraball ! This was our First Major Project in Game Development at AIE.

So! You're a science experiment gone wrong who just wants a loving family to be played with. The mad scientist is on your tail and has sent his evil creations to stop you! Escape the lab as fast as you can.... you're being timed! By the way, if you see any arcade tokens along the way make sure to grab them before you leave the level!

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Spacebar -to jump/ hold for longer jump/ release from slingshot
Shift- to Slam on enemies, down pipes, and halfpipes
E- to attach to slingshot

Designer: Mitchell Sayer
Programmer: Dylan Shorten
Modeler/Environmental/ Lighting Artist: Eva Ko
Animation and Character Artist: Matilda Wighton
Extra Scene Models Artist: Brayden Hardy

Sound Effects Audio: Royalty Free
Credit:
BGM: Royalty Free- Nightmare(Sinister Strings)- Brainbug
